docs.snippet: Salman Rushdie cancels, citing assassination threat....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jaipur Literature Festival got off to a macabre start on Friday with organizers announcing that the Indian-born author Salman Rushdie would not attend the event because of a new assassination threat against him. Instead, Mr. Rushdie said he would address the event via a video link.
